{"id":1040540419,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1693849993,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"96 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1040540419/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Insert Greatest Common Divisors in Linked List","memory":"30.2 MB","code":"/**\n * Definition for singly-linked list.\n * struct ListNode {\n *     int val;\n *     ListNode *next;\n *     ListNode() : val(0), next(nullptr) {}\n *     ListNode(int x) : val(x), next(nullptr) {}\n *     ListNode(int x, ListNode *next) : val(x), next(next) {}\n * };\n */\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    int getGCD(int a, int b){\n        int limit = max(a, b);\n        int max = 1;\n        for(int i=1;i<=limit;i++){\n            if(a % i == 0 && b % i == 0){\n                max = i;\n            }\n        }\n        return max;\n    }\n    ListNode* insertGreatestCommonDivisors(ListNode* head) {\n        ListNode* curr = head->next;\n        ListNode* prev = head;\n\n        while(curr != NULL){\n            int gcd = getGCD(prev->val, curr->val);\n            ListNode* temp = new ListNode(gcd);\n            prev->next = temp;\n            temp ->next = curr;\n            prev = curr;\n            curr = curr->next;\n        }\n\n        return head;\n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"insert-greatest-common-divisors-in-linked-list","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
